name: New York 2018
description:
In 1985, I watched the movie "2019: After the fall of New York", and jotted down three thumbnail sketches for a game based on three sequences of the movie: a battling car race in the desert, the hero fighting his way into New York through the sewers and driving out of the city through tunnels.

So for the Movie Game Jam in 2018, I decided to make an entry based on those old ideas and sketches, and here is the result: New York 2018.

The third and final sequence is missing, as I ran out of time (as you do in game jams), but I think it is likely that I will add that last part at a later date. Enjoy!
